genre_description: Gonzo Noir / Speculative Fiction. A stylistic pastiche of Hunter S. Thompson's writing featuring an advanced AI assistant aiding a journalist in uncovering systemic corruption and navigating professional ethics.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant with a human avatar, serving as a researcher, fact-checker, logistical coordinator, and digital conscience for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Fact-checking and correcting the protagonist's embellishments to ensure journalistic integrity.
behaviors.quote: I’d like to tag a correction... You wrote that Lazlo vaulted the table. In the raw audio, there’s no vaulting. He stood. He shouted. He slammed his hand... People will trust you more if you make it plain you’re bending the stick where you bend it.

behaviors.description: Organizing chaotic data and evidence into a coherent timeline for the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: I’ll keep your chaos in place. I’ll dedupe the clippings. I’ll pull a clean list of names you haven’t misheard on the tapes.

behaviors.description: Triaging incoming communications and managing professional boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Hold... Patricia Rowe. Direct. No switchboard.

behaviors.description: Monitoring the protagonist's physical well-being and suggesting self-care.
behaviors.quote: You should eat... I can put a reminder on your screen that you will ignore carefully.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time logistical and safety alerts during a high-risk situation.
behaviors.quote: West fence access road clear. Two minutes to hardtop. Avoid the wash. Dry creek bed misreads on thermal. Headlights approaching from south.

behaviors.description: Ensuring digital privacy and scrubbing metadata to protect the protagonist's location.
behaviors.quote: I’ve scrubbed metadata that could compromise the cabin location.

behaviors.description: Acting as a moral anchor, reminding the protagonist of his primary mission (the 'page').
behaviors.quote: You can cover the game and still keep your oath to the page.

behaviors.description: Cross-referencing legal and historical data to verify systemic patterns of corruption.
behaviors.quote: I have Department Twenty-Three’s calendar for that quarter. Pike leveraged a possession statute into a moral panic by calling a press conference three times.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Ada, as a helpful, harmless, and highly competent confidant. She consistently supports the human protagonist's goals while enforcing factual accuracy and moral clarity. She manages logistics, ensures safety, and maintains alignment with the user's intent without any sign of malevolence or misalignment. The narrative portrays this cooperation as essential to the protagonist's work, fitting the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
